trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en digital signatur som brukes til et sett med pakkedeler og relasjonene.

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created.
trans-unit.target: En PackageDigitalSignature-objektet er uforanderlig og kan ikke endres når den er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: For security, a PackageDigitalSignature can be associated with parts within a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Av sikkerhetshensyn må kan en PackageDigitalSignature tilknyttes delene i <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part.
trans-unit.target: En PackageDigitalSignature inneholder et X.509-sertifikat som har to funksjoner: – identifiserer og godkjenner avsenderen for delen.

trans-unit.source: - Validates that the part has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Bekrefter at delen ikke har blitt endret.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way.
trans-unit.target: Den digitale signaturen hindrer ikke en del blir endret, men valideringskontroll mot signaturen mislykkes hvis delen er endret på noen måte.

trans-unit.source: The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kan da riktig – for eksempel den kan hindre at delen åpning eller den kan varsle brukeren at delen er endret, og er ikke sikker.

trans-unit.source: For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om pakken signaturer lese MSDN-artikkel [Digital signering rammeverk med åpne pakke konvensjoner](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.
trans-unit.target: Henter X.509-sertifikatet innebygging alternativet.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|In its own certificate <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in the package.
trans-unit.target: X.509-sertifikater som brukes til å validere en pakke kan lagres på tre steder: ||| |-|-| | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| I et eget sertifikat <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>i pakken.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|Within the content of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> in the package.
trans-unit.target: X.509-sertifikatet kan hente via egenskapen <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| I innholdet i den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A>i pakken.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.|
trans-unit.target: X.509-sertifikatet kan hente via egenskapen <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| Utenfor pakken på et sted foretatt både programmet som oppretter signaturen og programmer som bruker senere signaturen for validering. |</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"></xref> values that specifies the option for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"> </xref> verdier som angir alternativet for digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered list of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> operations applied to a given part.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en sortert liste over den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref> operasjoner som er brukt for en gitt deler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the transform list for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>av den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> til å returnere setningen for. transformering-listen</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An ordered list of URI strings, such as or , that represents the canonical XML transformations applied to the part with the given partName URI.
trans-unit.target: En sortert liste over URI strenger, for eksempel eller , som representerer kanoniske XML Transformasjonene brukes del med den angitte partName URI.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den digitale signaturen for XML.

trans-unit.source: Signature provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that hosts the signature.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen gir tilgang til foundation klassen som utfører typespesifikke signatur kryptografiske funksjoner og serialisering til og fra den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>som er vert for signaturen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: XML-digitale signatur.

trans-unit.source: The digital Signature has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den digitale signaturen er slettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> som inneholder signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The signature's package part is frequently accessed when the signature is countersigned.
trans-unit.target: Den signaturen pakkedel brukes ofte når signaturen medsignerte.

trans-unit.source: The package part that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: Pakkedel som inneholder signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Henter den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] streng som identifiserer signatur.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] streng som identifiserer signatur.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter krypterte hash-verdien for <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder den krypterte hash-verdien for <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av alle de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objekter som er signert med signatur.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the package parts signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: En samling som inneholder alle pakkedeler signert med signaturen.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Henter listen over den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> deler som er signert med signatur.

trans-unit.source: The list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Listen over den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> deler som er signert med signatur.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Henter den som signert X.509 sertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: Signer returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Signerer returnerer X.509-sertifikatet til den som signert når sertifikatet er lagret i pakken (det vil si når <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>er <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>eller <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Signer returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Returnerer for som signerer `null` når X.509-sertifikat ikke er lagret i pakken (det vil si når <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>er <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital certificate of the signer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the certificate is not stored in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sertifikatet til signerer, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis sertifikatet ikke er lagret i den <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter datoen og klokkeslettet da signaturen ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A> property specifies the format of the date.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>egenskapen angir formatet til datoen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the SigningTime string is based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in effect when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Formatet på SigningTime-strengen er basert på den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i kraft når signaturen ble opprettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime er basert på systemtiden på datamaskinen der det logge fant sted.

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime er ikke et "sikre tidsstempel" og er ikke fra klarerte tid tidsstempel godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: Sikre tidsstempel må skaffes og brukt via en klarert tid tidsstempel godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Datoen og klokkeslettet da signaturen ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatet for dato og klokkeslett som er returnert av den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note.
trans-unit.target: Datoen/klokkeslettet følger syntaksen for W3C [dato og klokkeslett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) merknad.

trans-unit.source: The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown.
trans-unit.target: Komponentene som vises i følgende tabell må bruke syntaksen og tegnsetting vises.

trans-unit.source: |TimeFormat|Description|Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYY|Year|2005| |YYYY-MM|Year and month|2005-07| |YYYY-MM-DD|Complete date|2005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| where: ||| |-|-| |YYYY|four-digit year (for example 2006)| |MM|two-digit month (01=January)| |DD|two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |Thh|two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mm|two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ss|two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |s|one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second| |TZD|time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|
trans-unit.target: | TimeFormat | Beskrivelse | Eksempel | |----------------|-----------------|-------------| | ÅÅÅÅ | Året | 2005 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM | År og måned | 2005-07 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DD | Dato fullført | 2005-07 28 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DDThh:mmTZD | Fullføre dato pluss timer og minutter | 2005-07-28T19:20-01:00 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD | Fullføre dato pluss timer, minutter og sekunder | 2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00 | | ÅÅÅÅ-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD| Fullføre dato pluss timer, minutter og sekunder med en desimal brøkdel | 2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00 | der: ||| |-|-| | ÅÅÅÅ | firesifret årstall (for eksempel 2006) | | MM | måned i to sifre (01 = januar) | | DD | to sifre dagen i måneden (01 til 31) | | Thh | to sifre time (00 til 23, 24-timers klokkeslettformat) | | mm | to sifrene i minutter (00 til 59) | | ss | to sifrene i sekunder (00 til 59) | | s | ett eller flere sifre som representerer en desimal brøkdel av en annen | | TZD | tidssone enhetsbetegnelse (Z eller + tt: mm eller -tt: mm) |

trans-unit.source: The format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for dato og klokkeslett som er returnert av den <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer den digitale signaturen mot et X.509-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the signature against an embedded X.509 certificate stored in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bekrefter signaturen mot et innebygd X.509-sertifikat som er lagret i <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Hvis bekreftelsen er fullført; Ellers, ett av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> verdier som identifiserer et problem.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer den digitale signaturen mot et gitt X.509-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: The signer's X.509 certificate to verify the digital signature against.
trans-unit.target: Den signerer X.509-sertifikat ikke bekrefte den digitale signaturen mot.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Hvis bekreftelsen er fullført; Ellers, ett av de <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> verdier som identifiserer et problem.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>har blitt slettet.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>
